org.testingsoftware.selrunner

Class AbstractRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testingsoftware.selrunner.AbstractRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChromeRunner, FirefoxRemoteRunner, FirefoxRunner, InternetExplorerRemoteRunner, InternetExplorerRunner, PhantomJsRunner

    public abstract class AbstractRunner
extends Object
    Simple Webdriver adapter intended to be used with Fitnesse/Slim.

      • click

        public void click(org.openqa.selenium.By by)
        Click the element specified by the selector. This uses the standard webdriver convention to specify selectors: :
        Parameters:
        by - specify selector e.g. "css:ok_button"
        See Also:
        BySelector

      • containsText

        Does the current element contain the text text.
        Parameters:
        text - specify the text you are looking for.
        Returns:
        true if current element contains the specified text.

        Returns:
